issue.title: [Python] RecordBatchStreamReader::Open2 cdef type signature doesn't match C++
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6053](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6053). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Cython method signature for RecordBatchStreamReader::Open2 doesn't match the C++ type signature and causes a compiler type error trying to call Open2 from Cython.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6053?focusedCommentId=16895201) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4957
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4957>
